summary: Spiritbox is a Canadian heavy metal band formed in 2017 by Mike Stringer and Courtney LaPlante. The band, which includes a married couple and two other members, combines metal with electronic sounds. They started by releasing music online and quickly gained fans. Their debut album, *Eternal Blue*, reached the top 20 on the US Billboard charts. Spiritbox has released several EPs and singles, with their latest EP, *The Fear of Fear*, coming out in 2023.
title: Spiritbox
